name: MCP Protocol Compliance
description: Ensures MCP server implementations comply with Model Context Protocol standards

validationCriteria.check: Verify request/response format, error handling, and method dispatch

validationCriteria.description: All required MCP methods are implemented
validationCriteria.check: Verify tools/list and tools/call methods are implemented and functional
validationCriteria.errorMessage: Required MCP methods are missing or non-functional

validationCriteria.check: Validate tool definitions match MCP tool schema requirements
validationCriteria.errorMessage: Tool schemas do not conform to MCP specification

validationCriteria.description: Error responses follow MCP error format
validationCriteria.check: Verify error responses include proper error codes and messages
validationCriteria.errorMessage: Error responses do not follow MCP error format

validationCriteria.description: Server works with standard MCP transports
validationCriteria.check: Test server with stdio and other supported transports
validationCriteria.errorMessage: Server is not compatible with standard MCP transports
